plot_DTPM_example.py

1 import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
2 import pandas as pd
3 import numpy as np
4 
5 plt.rcParams.update({'font.size': 14})
6 
7 def plot_perf_ener_edp(run_script = False):
8  fig, (ax_perf, ax_ener, ax_edp) = plt.subplots(3, 1, figsize=(10,8))
9 
10  x_labels = ["Performance", "Ondemand", "Powersave", "IL-DTPM"]
11 
12  combined_csv = []
13  file_list = ["results-Perf.csv", "results-OD.csv", "results-Powersave.csv", "results-IL-DTPM.csv"]
14  for file_name in file_list:
15  if run_script:
16  csv_file = pd.read_csv("./reports/" + file_name)
17  else:
18  csv_file = pd.read_csv("../reports/" + file_name)
19  combined_csv.append(csv_file.tail(1))
20 
21  combined_csv = pd.concat(combined_csv, sort=False)
22 
23  perf_values = combined_csv["Execution time(us)"].to_list()
24  y_perf = [i / perf_values[0] for i in perf_values]
25  ener_values = pd.to_numeric(combined_csv["Total energy consumption(J)"]).to_list()
26  y_ener = [i / ener_values[0] for i in ener_values]
27  edp_values = pd.to_numeric(combined_csv["EDP"]).to_list()
28  y_edp = [i / edp_values[0] for i in edp_values]
29 
30  x = np.arange(len(x_labels))
31  ax_perf.bar(x, y_perf, color='#800020', edgecolor='black', width=0.5)
32  ax_ener.bar(x, y_ener, color='#2F3E5E', edgecolor='black', width=0.5)
33  ax_edp.bar(x, y_edp, color='#008000', edgecolor='black', width=0.5)
34 
35  ax_perf.set_axisbelow(True)
36  ax_perf.yaxis.grid(color='gray', linestyle='dashed', linewidth=0.5, zorder=0)
37  ax_ener.set_axisbelow(True)
38  ax_ener.yaxis.grid(color='gray', linestyle='dashed', linewidth=0.5, zorder=0)
39  ax_edp.set_axisbelow(True)
40  ax_edp.yaxis.grid(color='gray', linestyle='dashed', linewidth=0.5, zorder=0)
41 
42  ax_perf.set_ylabel("Exec. Time")
43  ax_ener.set_ylabel("Energy Cons.")
44  ax_edp.set_ylabel("EDP")
45 
46  ax_perf.set_xticks(x, minor=False)
47  ax_perf.set_xticklabels(x_labels, fontdict=None, minor=False)
48  ax_ener.set_xticks(x, minor=False)
49  ax_ener.set_xticklabels(x_labels, fontdict=None, minor=False)
50  ax_edp.set_xticks(x, minor=False)
51  ax_edp.set_xticklabels(x_labels, fontdict=None, minor=False)
52 
53  y_lim_perf = 2.51
54  y_lim_ener = 1.10
55  y_lim_edp = 1.10
56  ax_perf.set_ylim([0, y_lim_perf])
57  ax_perf.set_yticks(np.arange(0, y_lim_perf, 0.25))
58  ax_ener.set_ylim([0, y_lim_ener])
59  ax_ener.set_yticks(np.arange(0, y_lim_ener, 0.1))
60  ax_edp.set_ylim([0, y_lim_edp])
61  ax_edp.set_yticks(np.arange(0, y_lim_edp, 0.1))
62 
63  fig.tight_layout()
64  plt.show()
65 
66 if __name__ == '__main__':
67  plot_perf_ener_edp()
